text:
<@U01J9BAEPFV> Thanks for offering help!  So you mean I should paste that code in my page.html template?  If that is the case, then no it did not resolve my problem.  I am further away from where I was before when I try that approach as neither of the "drop modules here" boxes are now rendering on my page.

As I said, I'm extending a base.html layout here with {% extends "./layouts/base.html" %} at the top of my page.html template.  Given, this maybe I need to include something in base.html so that the code in page.html can be read?

And yeah I do have layouts_.css included

You have to link that _layout.css file in the `base.html` file.
for more, you can refer <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/tree/main/src|HubSpot Theme>

Below from left to right I have included:

base.html, main.css, _layouts.css as found in the boilerplate theme.

Then in a file called page.html in the templates directory, I have the code you provided except wrapped in a dnd_area tag since docs and an error message told me I needed to
